tool_description: Optimizes prayer schedule timing to minimize conflicts and maximize adherence based on user constraints and preferences.

schedule_id.description: Identifier of the schedule to optimize

busy_periods.description: Array of busy time periods in HH:MM-HH:MM format

optimization_goal.description: Primary optimization goal: maximize_adherence, minimize_conflicts, even_distribution, tradition_alignment

allow_early_adjustment.description: Allow moving prayers earlier than preferred time

allow_late_adjustment.description: Allow moving prayers later than preferred time

error_messages: Invalid schedule ID: The provided schedule ID does not exist
Invalid busy period format: Use HH:MM-HH:MM format for time periods
Invalid optimization goal: Use one of [maximize_adherence, minimize_conflicts, even_distribution, tradition_alignment]
Invalid minimum gap: Minimum gap must be between 5 and 60 minutes
Overlapping busy periods: Remove overlaps in busy period specifications
usage: Provide schedule ID, busy periods, and optimization goal. Optionally set minimum gap between prayers and adjustment preferences. Returns an optimized schedule with timing adjustments.

adjusted_times.description: Array of optimized prayer times in HH:MM format
